mapper.insert: insert into scenic (scenicName, maxCapacity, leftTopX, leftTopY, rightBottomX, rightBottomY) value (#{scenicName}, #{maxCapacity}, #{leftTopX}, #{leftTopY}, #{rightBottomX}, #{rightBottomY});
mapper.select: select scenicId, scenicName, lastModifyTime, maxCapacity, leftTopX, leftTopY, rightBottomX, rightBottomY, (select count(*) from user where userX >= leftTopX and userX <=rightBottomX and userY >= leftTopY and userY <=rightBottomY)as currentNumber from scenic
